Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polygon
  • public class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Polygon object by an array of appropriate Point objects. Maximum Polygon size is 10 vertices.
    Version:
    07-12-2020
    Author:
    Simon Lousky

      Polygon()
      Construct a Polygon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon()
        Construct a Polygon.

    • Method Detail

      • addVertex

        public boolean addVertex​(double x,
                         double y)
        Method addVertex add new appropriate Point in this vertices array - this Polygon. If the method succeed to add the Point, returns true, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        x - The x new Point coordinate
        y - The y new Point coordinate
        Returns:
        If the method succeed to add the Point

      • highestVertex

        public Point highestVertex()
        Method highestVertex returns the highest vertice in this Polygon. If there are more than one, the method returns the first one it find. If there are no vertices, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        The highest vertice in this Polygon

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this Polygon.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representasion of this Polygon

      • calcPerimeter

        public double calcPerimeter()
        Method calcPerimeter calculates and returns the Polygon perimeter. If there are less than two Point in the array, the method return 0. If there are two Point in the array, the method return the distance between them.
        Returns:
        The Polygon perimeter

      • calcArea

        public double calcArea()
        Method calcArea calculates and returns the Polygon area. If there are less than three Point in the array, the method return 0.
        Returns:
        The Polygon area

      • isBigger

        public boolean isBigger​(Polygon other)
        Method isBigger checks if this Polygon area is bigger than a reference Polygon area.
        Parameters:
        other - The reference Polygon
        Returns:
        True if this Polygon area is bigger than a reference Polygon area

      • findVertex

        public int findVertex​(Point p)
        Method findVertex receives a Point and returns his place in the vertices array. If the Point is not in the vertices array, the method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        p - The Point to find his index in the vertices array
        Returns:
        The index of the Point in the vertices array

      • getNextVertex

        public Point getNextVertex​(Point p)
        Method getNextVertex receives a Point and returns the next Point relative to him in the vertices array. If the Point is not in the vertices array, the method returns null. If the Point is the last in the vertices array, the method returns the first Point in the vertices array. If the Point is the only one in the vertices array, the method returns the Point.
        Parameters:
        p - The Point to which the function returns the next point
        Returns:
        The next Point relative to the Point received

      • getBoundingBox

        public Polygon getBoundingBox()
        Method getBoundingBox Returns the bounding rectangle of the polygon. The method returns the bounding rectangle as a Polygon object. If there are less than three Point in the array, the method returns null.
        Returns:
        The return value
